SummaryStart: ^Final production meeting. Confirm completion plans and today's tasks.
Art_Completion: ^All art assets finalized. Final pre-delivery checks passed successfully.
Audio_Delivery: ^Sound library organized. Ready to deliver complete audio package.
Code_Lock: ^Entering code lockdown phase. Final module integration in progress.
Design_Signoff: ^Design docs and balance tables finalized. Core loop approved.
Narrative_Complete: ^Final scripts and cutscenes confirmed. Story production complete.
Launch_Ready: ^Full test reports meet launch criteria. Post-release monitoring prepared.
